desc: East Bay Logistics (EBL) is the West Coast leader in full service green bean logistics service to the coffee and cocoa industries. EBL and its related companies: EBL Coffee and EBL Coffee LA, manage the customer supply chain from the ports (Oakland, Long Beach and Los Angeles) to roasting plants and manufacturing.

layout.text: East Bay Logistics is the West Coast leader in full service green bean logistics service to the coffee and cocoa industries since 1997
